data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kubik, Stepan, Bartak, Miroslav (2014): A new species of Trichieurina (Diptera, Chloropidae) with a key to the world species of the genus. ZooKeys 433: 89-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.433.7847, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.433.7847
